mapper.select: select announcement.id,date,title,username as authorName from announcement,user where authorId=user.id and visible='1' order by id desc limit #{start},#{num}
select count(id) from onlinejudge.announcement where visible='1'
select title,content,username as authorName,date from announcement,user where announcement.id=#{id} and user.id=announcement.authorId and visible='1'
select announcement.id,title,date,visible,username as authorName from announcement,user where authorId=user.id and title like "%"#{key}"%" order by id desc limit #{start},#{num}
select visible from announcement where id=#{id}
